categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Improcco Company was a division of clone troopers led by Jedi General Etain Tur-Mukan. The company was based out of the Acclamator-class assault ship Fearless. During the Skirmish at Dinlo, Improcco served with the 41st Elite Corps, with Clone Commander Gett serving as its commanding officer. At Dinlo, they extracted the Sarlacc Battalions A and B.

Improcco Company assisted anti-terror ops on Coruscant by being placed on leave, and providing clone commando squads Delta and Omega cover so the squads could conduct crucial surveillance. However, Kal Skirata noted that the men of Improcco Company did not seem to enjoy their leave. This was attributed to clone troopers having little freedom and few modes of entertainment, and thus were not used to the new found liberty.
